[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

See a level in your OSRS stats.

**Usage**

- `/lvl rsn:<string> skill:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `rsn` | `string` | Yes | The runescape username to check | - |
| `skill` | `string` | Yes | The skill you want to select. | - |

**Examples**

- `/lvl rsn:Magnaboy skill:Mining`
